https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5F1wYmjjUteO6ImgD6ZgbWcw5Yq.jpg "This lone video artifact offers indisputable evidence that in 1980 Devo had reached a turning point. We were no longer just art monsters, we were mainstream performers too. " - Gerald V. Casale (from the back of the DVD case) August 17, 1980 Phoenix Theater, Petaluma Devo Live 1980
